text:
Hi folks,
Maybe this is slightly off topic... But, unless I've completely misunderstood things, the only way to generate a link to a contact's subscription preferences page, is by using the {{ unsubscribe_link }} token in an email. Has anyone found a workaround for this or know of any other way to let a user update her subscription preferences without clicking through an email?
This is a masive problem, MASIVE in my experience
<@U2LEJ045D> I'm running into the exact same issue with Safari -- did you have any luck running this down?

Hi Derek, sorry to bug you again. We updated to V3 SF integration but it looks like the Conversion Events and Recent Conversion Date fields are not getting updated.  Are these deprecated, by chance? <https://sg.d.pr/bvTqMr>
<@U7SL518D6> Didn't see your reply until now. Thank you!
